parameters: \nr<Owlf>I believe that your meal is cold. I had expected
\nr<Aubrienne>They're awake, and they didn't wake me up?
\nr<Owlf>Forgive me. I only do as I am commanded, and I was
given no command to wake you.
\nr<Aubrienne>Literally the most important day of our lives
and you can't go a little off script?
\nr<Aubrienne>Where are Damia and Eleanora any way...?
\nr<Owlf>Damia is training at the waterfall, and Eleanora
is saying good-bye to the animals at the clearing.
\nr<Owlf>As a reminder, the spell your aunt used to
summon me will wear out during the Witch Moot.
\nr<Owlf>You will want to gather your sisters soon. Before
you go, I should warn you that Eleanora reports
rampant goblin activity in the forest today.
\nr<Owlf>I have a quiz to prepare you for the journey.
\nr<Aubrienne>A quiz!? I'm not a child! I know how to handle
\nr<Owlf>Then it will be simple to complete this quiz.
Aubrienne, you must be prepared. Your magic isn't
strong enough to rely on when you're alone.
\nr<Owlf>You encounter a single goblin. How do you survive?
\nr<Owlf>Incorrect. With a single goblin it is wiser to
\nr<Owlf>Correct! A single goblin is physically weaker than
\nr<Owlf>Incorrect. A goblin will easily outrun you.
\nr<Owlf>You encounter three goblins. How do you survive?
\nr<Owlf>Incorrect. While afraid of fire, each goblin will
think that you will target it with a fire spell while
it turns to run. Each goblin will try its hardest to
stop you from casting the spell that kills it.
\nr<Owlf>Correct. The goblins will fight over who gets to
\nr<Owlf>You encounter nine goblins. How do you survive?
\nr<Owlf>Correct! It may seem odd, but in large groups
goblins will run away from fire spells, thinking that
its companions are more likely to be hit than itself.
\nr<Owlf>Incorrect. In large groups there will be a leader
who will direct the pack to chase you.
\nr<Owlf>I am satisfied with your answers. You may go to
the forest and gather your sisters.
\nr<Owlf>With them, I'm sure you'll be able to conquer any
\nr<Aubrienne>So. We're back home. It's... weird without Owlf
\n<Damia>Yea. Gonna miss that weird little guy.
\n<Damia>So what, we're just on our own now!?
\n<Damia>Our mom and aunt left us while we're playing in the
mud outside and let a little ball of goop cook and
\nr<Eleanora>We were always meant to leave this place and find our
\nr<Aubrienne>We'd have to build houses, not just settle them.
\nr<Eleanora>Owlf never showed me how to do that. I would be
much happier in a large stump, anyways.
\n<Damia>This morning I was planning my escape to the
human world to leave all of this behind...
\n<Damia>Aubrienne's most impressive spell was making a spark
with half of the strength of striking a flint...
\n<Damia>And Eleanora was explaining to a frog that she'd
\n<Damia>And now Aubrienne can summon a fireball that would
burn any of us to crisp... that she learned by
\n<Damia>I can't even process that. And we have to cook our own
\nr<Eleanora>Damia, it is fine. We are powerful Witches and can
\n<Damia>Together, yea. Because that's what we've got, right?
\n<Damia>That's what our mom left us - eachother.
\nr<Eleanora>I think that Damia is upset about something.
\nr<Eleanora>That is quite strange. Usually she is being mean and
\nr<Eleanora>Have we switched roles? Am I the mean one now?
\n<Aubrienne>No, none of us have changed "roles". It's just been a
\nr<Eleanora>Okay. Have a good night, dear sister.
\nr<Eleanora>Dream fondly of the forest, but not too fondly. It
\n<Aubrienne>When you use magic... does it feel... smaller?
\nr<Eleanora>Like mana consumption? It makes my brain tired.
\n<Aubrienne>Not like that. Like... when you've taken a bite of an
apple, and now there's less apple?
\nr<Eleanora>I mean in regarding to magic. Yes, I understand how
eating food works.\} Although sometimes I must wonder if
\nr<Damia>Owlf always did this for me and even if I swallowed
my pride and used ice magic that's not going to get
\n<Aubrienne>This is a very good start to the day. I need you to
\nr<Damia>Stop being smug and just light the damn fire!
\nr<Damia>Don't let it get to your head, Aubs.
\n<Aubrienne>Let what get to my head? That you need me? That you
can't achieve basic tasks without me?
\nr<Damia>If you shut up right now I might still cook you
\nr<Owlf>You do not want to be late for the Witch Moot.
\nr<Aubrienne>It's been a long day. I'm ready to sleep!
\nr<Owlf>You should take an apple, for the journey.
